```python
from memory.conversations import (
    ConversationManager, FeishuSync, Tagger, Summarizer
)

manager = ConversationManager()
tagger = Tagger()
summarizer = Summarizer()

sync = FeishuSync(manager)

for conv in conversations:

    conv.tags = list(tags)
    conv.summary = summary.content
    manager.save(conv, tagged=True)
```
